keyword: how many calories in a cupcake
title: How Many Calories Are in a Cupcake?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cupcake, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Cupcake?
assumptions: Standard size (~50g) vanilla cupcake with chocolate frosting; baked, no fillings or toppings beyond basic frosting.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, frosting type, and brand. Check labels or recipes for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A typical cupcake provides about 280 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cupcake without frosting?
faqs.a: About 160 kcal for a plain baked cupcake.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a standard cupcake?
faqs.a: Roughly 40 g carbs, 12 g fat, 3 g protein, and 30 g sugars.

faqs.q: Do cupcakes have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 30 g or more per cupcake, mainly from frosting and batter.

faqs.q: How does cupcake size affect calories?
faqs.a: Mini cupcakes are ~100 kcal; jumbo ones can exceed 500 kcal.
